name: NextDoor
description:
Short cinematic pixel horror game inspired by Junji Ito's manga.

If there is no sound, please click the screen.

This game has controller support. 

Downloading and playing using the executable is recommended!

If you're experiencing any bugs or crashes, consider downloading the Desktop version.

Enjoy!

The following is a non-profit fan project. In tribute of Junji Ito's Mimi's Ghost Stories. Junji Ito is not affiliated with this project. All content is the property of their respective owners.

Design/Animation by Sijbren Schenkels
Code by Yun Ying Hu
3D/Lighting by Bjorn Dingeldein
Music by Clément Panchout
